00050 class PxBoxControllerDesc : public PxControllerDesc
00051 {
00052 public:
00056     PX_INLINE                               PxBoxControllerDesc();
00057     PX_INLINE virtual                       ~PxBoxControllerDesc();
00058 
00062     PX_INLINE virtual   void                setToDefault();
00063 
00069     PX_INLINE virtual   bool                isValid()       const;
00070 
00076     PxF32               halfHeight;         // Half-height in the "up" direction
00077 
00083     PxF32               halfSideExtent;     // Half-extent in the "side" direction
00084 
00090     PxF32               halfForwardExtent;  // Half-extent in the "forward" direction
00091 };
00092 
00093 PX_INLINE PxBoxControllerDesc::PxBoxControllerDesc() :
00094     PxControllerDesc    (PxControllerShapeType::eBOX),
00095     halfHeight          (1.0f),
00096     halfSideExtent      (0.5f),
00097     halfForwardExtent   (0.5f)
00098 {
00099 }
00100 
00101 PX_INLINE PxBoxControllerDesc::~PxBoxControllerDesc()
00102 {
00103 }
00104 
00105 PX_INLINE void PxBoxControllerDesc::setToDefault()
00106 {
00107     *this = PxBoxControllerDesc();
00108 }
00109 
00110 PX_INLINE bool PxBoxControllerDesc::isValid() const
00111 {
00112     if(!PxControllerDesc::isValid())    return false;
00113     if(halfHeight<=0.0f)                return false;
00114     if(halfSideExtent<=0.0f)            return false;
00115     if(halfForwardExtent<=0.0f)         return false;
00116     if(stepOffset>2.0f*halfHeight)      return false;   // Prevents obvious mistakes
00117     return true;
00118 }
00119

00129     virtual                     ~PxBoxController()  {}

00171 
00182     virtual     bool            setHalfSideExtent(PxF32 halfSideExtent)         = 0;
00183 
00194     virtual     bool            setHalfForwardExtent(PxF32 halfForwardExtent)   = 0;
00195 };
